name: Stick it to the wall
description:
A wall message collage simulator!

You have a message to spread? Stick it to the wall ! But be careful, cops are not your friends and will arrest you if you get caught!

Goal:

Do your message, finish it when you want and turnoff your light when car cops are approaching.

Controls:

-left click : pick up paper sheet with letter / stick it to the wall

-right click : turn off and turn on your torchlight 

-space : finish your message when you want and restart a new message

Notes:

I made it in few hours of work on 2 days so sorry for the general quality of the game I will surely update it ASAP ;)
